alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fond du Lac (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 5:44PM CDT until July 23 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Fond du Lac County in east central Wisconsin... Dodge County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 544 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Markesan to near Rio to 6 miles southeast of Sauk City, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fond Du Lac, Watertown, Beaver Dam, Hartford, Waupun, Mayville, Horicon, Juneau, Lomira, Theresa, Hustisford, Oakfield, Iron Ridge, Brandon, Burnett, Ashippun, Rubicon, Lamartine, Lebanon and Byron. This includes the following Location Horicon Marsh. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
